node.name: FAB Defense 9mm Dummy Rounds (10 Pack)
node.short_description: The FAB Defense 9mm Dummy Round Ammunition allows for professional dry handgun training and the loading of 9mm polymer bullets to your magazine.
node.description:
The FAB Defense 9mm Dummy Round Ammunition allows for professional dry handgun training and the loading of 9mm polymer bullets to your magazine.

 

FAB 9mm Dummy Rounds Advantages:

Exact replica of 9x19 ammunition, manufactured with high grade durable bright red polymer, easily distinguishes from a live round
Enables safer realistic handgun exercises (magazine changes, malfunctions, stoppages, cocking and ejection practice)
Allows weapon handling training scenarios to provide closest to real-time characteristics training scenarios
Features a higher degree of safety than live fire training
Enables normal function of magazine handling, charging and ejection

 

FAB 9mm Dummy Rounds Compatibility:

9x19 mm handguns

node.name: FAB Defense AG43 Tactical Pistol Grip
node.short_description: The AG-43 State-of-the-Art Tactical Pistol Grip from FAB Defense enhances grip control, reduces slipping and wrist fatigue, improving overall control during firing sequences.
node.description:
The AG-43 State-of-the-Art Tactical Pistol Grip from FAB Defense enhances grip control, reduces slipping and wrist fatigue, improving overall control during firing sequences.

 

AG43 Tactical Pistol Grip Advantages:

Ergonomic non-slip design
Finger grooves and backstrap shape for enhanced, more comfortable grip
Extended beavertail enables higher, firmer hold, for superior weapon handling
Readily accessible storage compartment with tight-sealing hinged door

 

AG43 Tactical Pistol Grip Compatibility:

M-16 / SR-25 / AR-10 / AR-15 Variants

node.name: FAB Defense AG47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip
node.short_description: The AG-47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip from FAB Defense provides enhanced grip and improved weapon handling for your AK-47/74.
node.description:
The AG-47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip from FAB Defense provides enhanced grip and improved weapon handling for your AK-47/74.

 

AG47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip Advantages:

Ergonomic design prevents wrist fatigue and ensures secure grip
Improves trigger operation
Built-In storage compartment with removable 2x CR123 battery holder
Made of MIL-SPEC fiberglass reinforced polymer composite
Finger grooves and backstrap shape for enhanced, more comfortable grip

 

AG47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip Compatibility:

AK-47/74, AKS-74U 'Krinkov', Galil Models

node.name: FAB Defense AGR43 Tactical Pistol Grip
node.short_description: The AGR-43 Tactical Pistol Grip from FAB Defense is the latest in a line of pistol grips featuring multi-textured rubber, enhancing your grip experience.
node.description:
The AGR-43 Tactical Pistol Grip from FAB Defense is the latest in a line of pistol grips featuring multi-textured rubber, enhancing your grip experience.

Incorporated into its design, is the superior contour of its predecessor, adding even more comfort and proper ventilation needed in extreme heat and moist environments, giving you the edge you need in the field or at the range.

 

AGR43 Tactical Pistol Grip Advantages:

MIL-SPEC reinforced polymer composite with multi-textured rubber overmould superior coating
Three different overmould rubber textures; rib studded at palm, alligator pattern for front fingers and moon surface textured sides
Multi textured rubber provides superior ventilation, prevents slip and reduces sweaty palms
Finger grooves and backstrap shape for enhanced, more comfortable grip
Extended beavertail for better control, allowing a higher firmer hold
Readily accessible storage area with securely sealed hinged door

 

AGR43 Tactical Pistol Grip Compatibility:

M-16 / SR-25 / AR-15 variants

node.name: FAB Defense AR Podium Bipod
node.short_description: The AR-Podium is easily deployed with the main shooting hand, without having to alter the grip on the weapon or lose sight of the target.
node.description:
The AR-Podium implements a bi-pod support for the AR-15 in a new and innovative way. Enabling the operator to install a steady and durable bi-pod platform without adding front-end weight and saving valuable rail space.

The AR-Podium is easily deployed with the main shooting hand, without having to alter the grip on the weapon or lose sight of the target.

Weight of the Podium alone is 237 g

 

 

AR Podium Bipod Features:

Compact and sleek design with no protruding parts
Rapid deployment mechanism operates by the push of a button
Provides steady and durable bipod platform
Quick and easy installation, no Gunsmith required
Made of light and durable high-end reinforced polymer composite
Saves valuable rail space for additional mounting options
The model includes the AGR-43 pistol grip and the Podium bi-pod

 

AR Podium Bipod Compatibility:

M-16 / AR-15 , 5.56x45 lower receiver variants, with a standard magazine well

node.name: FAB Defense AR15 Collapsible Buttstock
node.short_description: The FAB Defense Collapsible Buttstock for your AR15/M16 provides you with enhanced versatility with its stock extension and optional adjustable Cheek Rest.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Collapsible Buttstock for your AR15/M16 provides you with enhanced versatility with its stock extension and optional adjustable Cheek Rest.

 

Collapsible Buttstock AR15 Advantages:

Uniquely designed rubber butt pad for fast and stable shoulder positioning
Unique patented “Anti-Rattle” mechanism, fits perfectly on MIL-SPEC and commercial after-market buffer tubes
Three Integrated Slots for Sling Attachment, One in the Front and Two at the Rear
Two Ambidextrous Metal Quick Release Rear Sling Mount Points
Water-resistant anti rattle storage compartment for two CR123 or AA batteries
Maintains Contour & Size of Original Design
Made from fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

node.name: FAB Defense Adjustable Cheek Rest
node.short_description: The FAB Defense Adjustable Cheek Rest equips your GLR-16 Tactical Buttstock with a speciality made Cheek Piece.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Adjustable Cheek Rest equips your GLR-16 Tactical Buttstock with a specialty made Cheek Piece.

 

Adjustable Cheek Rest Advantages:

Fully Adjustable Cheek Rest
Easy to Attach and Dismantle
Lightweight and Strong
Easy to Install
No Gunsmith Required

node.name: FAB Defense Advanced Mag-Well Grip
node.short_description: The Advanced Mag-Well Grip has a system of easily replaceable grips. The Tactical grip can be used while performing drills on the range, and then quickly replaced with a Mask grip.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Advance Mag-Well Grip is the latest evolution of FAB-Defense' bestselling product, the MWG.

The Advanced Mag Well Grip is the first product developed with the recreational shooter in mind, like its predecessor, the grip transforms the standard AR Magwell into a comfortable and ergonomic foregrip with a flared and extended magazine well that enhances reload speed while adding an ornamental aspect to the firearm.

The Advanced Mag-Well Grip has a system of easily replaceable grips; the Tactical grip can be used while performing drills on the range, and then quickly replaced with a Mask grip, according to personal preferences.

 

Advanced Mag Well Grip Advantages:

Replaceable grip area (Comes standard with the Tactical grip and one Mask grip)
Functions as a flared and extended magazine well, enhances reload speed under stress
Quick and easy installation, no gunsmith required
Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction

 

Advanced Mag Well Grip Compatibility:

M16 5.56x45 lower receiver variants, without a flared magazine well.
May not work well with the PMAG GEN3

node.name: FAB Defense FGG-S Tactical Folding Foregrip
node.short_description: The FAB Defense FGG-S Tactical Folding Foregrip enables an additional ‘horizontal to vertical’ grip option on your weapon, enhancing tactical versatility and performance.
node.description:
The FAB Defense FGG-S Tactical Folding Foregrip enables an additional 'horizontal to vertical' grip option on your weapon, enhancing tactical versatility and performance.

 

FGG-S Tactical Folding Foregrip Advantages:

Specifically designed not to interfere with handgun firing when in horizontal position
Quickly transforms from a horizontal grip to a vertical grip
Easy and fast adapt/removal mechanism

 

FGG-S Tactical Folding Foregrip Compatibility:

1913 MIL-STD picatinny rails
Most handguns with underside accessory rail

node.name: FAB Defense GL Core S Buttstock
node.short_description: The FAB Defense GL-Core S Buttstock is designed to be short and compact for CQB scenarios whilst providing strength and stability for mid-range engagements.
node.description:
The FAB Defense GL-Core S Buttstock was specifically designed for one of the best Israeli Counter-Terrorism units, to be used as a primary buttstock.

The design process started with the GL-Core buttstock and implemented all the design changes that were requested to create a buttstock that will be short and compact for CQB scenarios but will still provide strength and stability for mid-range engagements.

 

FAB Defense GL Core S Buttstock Advantages:

Small and compact allowing for easy manoeuvrability during CQB
Flat faced rubberized butt-pad designed for use with and without tactical body armour
Interchangeable buffer tube adapters for a tight fit on Mil-Spec and Commercial buffer tubes
Integrated cheek weld optimized for the M4/AR15 platforms
No protruding parts, will not get caught on gear or webbing
Inversed positioning lever will not open accidently
Two integrated quick detach rear sling swivel connectors
Made of durable and light-weight fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

node.name: FAB Defense GL-CORE AR15/M4 Collapsible Buttstock
node.short_description: The FAB Defense GL-CORE Collapsible Buttstock is an ergonomically shaped, rubberised buttpad for quick shouldering and manoeuvring.
node.description:
The FAB Defense GL-CORE Collapsible Buttstock is an ergonomically shaped, rubberised buttpad for quick shouldering and manoeuvring.

The integrated cheek weld, ergonomic buttpad and an interchanging tube adapter, provide an unmatched fit on Mil-Spec and Commercial buffer tubes, with a high level of efficiency and comfort.

 

 

FAB Defense AR15/M4 GL-CORE Collapsible Buttstock Advantages:

Ergonomically shaped rubberized butt-pad for quick shouldering and easy manoeuvring of the weapon
Interchangeable buffer tube adapters for a tight fit on Mil-Spec and Commercial buffer tubes
Integrated cheek weld in an overall compact and sleek design
No protruding parts, will not get caught on gear or webbing
Inversed positioning lever will not open accidently
Two integrated quick detach rear sling swivel connectors
Made of durable and light-weight fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

node.name: FAB Defense GL-Shock CP Buttstock
node.short_description: The revolutionary patented ‘GL-Shock’ CP Buttstock from FAB Defense contains a recoil-reducing mechanism with a built-in premium silicon chrome-alloy spring, creating a State-of-the-Art stock for your M4/M16.
node.description:
The revolutionary patented 'GL-Shock' CP Buttstock from FAB Defense contains a recoil-reducing mechanism with a built-in premium silicon chrome-alloy spring, creating a State-of-the-Art stock for your M4/M16.

 

GL-Shock CP Buttstock Advantages:

Unique Patented “Anti-Rattle” Mechanism
Sleek New Design with No Protruding Parts, Will Not Get Caught on Gear and Webbing
Unique New Slick and Quick Operated Inversed Positioning Lever
Integral Ribbed Rubber Butt Pad with a Non Slip Design
Integrated Quick Detach “QD” Sling Swivel Connectors on Both Sides
Watertight Battery Storage for Two CR123A 3V Lithium Batteries / AA 1.5v
Fits Perfectly on Both Tubes - MIL-SPEC and Commercial Aftermarket!
Made from Mill-Spec Reinforced Composite Polymer
With an Adjustable Cheek Rest.
